si.title: පාසලක පාසල් සිසුවිය මිය යයි
body_lines: මහනුවර, ටෙල්ඩෙනියා - දකුණු කලාපය වැටී ඇත.

en.title: Schoolgirl dies in a house
body_lines: A house in the Kandy, Teldeniya - Southern region has fallen.

summary_lines: Tragic incident: Schoolgirl dies in house collapse in Kandy's Teldeniya area. House fell in Southern region, causing loss of life. Local authorities investigating cause. Community mourning young victim.
